Class RunJUnitMethodThread

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class RunJUnitMethodThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Execute a JUnit test method as thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RunJUnitMethodThread

        public RunJUnitMethodThread(java.lang.Object loadTestPlugin,
                    LoadtestPluginContext pluginContext,
                    java.lang.String testMethodName)
        Create a new thread.
        Parameters:
        loadTestPlugin - an instance of a load test plug-in, that implements the RunJUnitMethodInterface
        pluginContext - the plug-in context
        testMethodName - the name of the JUnit test method to be run
        See Also:
        LoadtestPluginInterface, LoadtestPluginContext, RunJUnitMethodInterface
